meanings.definition: The quality or state of being roguish.
meanings.sent1: His roguishness was evident in the mischievous twinkle in his eye.
meanings.sent2: Her playful roguishness always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent3: The children's roguishness during the game of hide-and-seek made it even more fun.
meanings.sent4: The roguishness of the raccoon as it stole the picnic basket was both daring and amusing.
meanings.sent5: The pirate's roguishness was so captivating that even the crew couldn't help but admire him.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions characteristic of a rogue.
meanings.sent1: The roguishness of the thief was evident in his sly smile.
meanings.sent2: His roguishness often got him into trouble with the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The cat's roguishness as it knocked over the vase was both frustrating and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The roguishness of the fox as it outsmarted the farmer was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The roguishness of the con artist was so convincing that many fell for his schemes.

meanings.sent1: The children's roguishness at the party led to a lot of laughter.
meanings.sent2: Her roguishness was revealed when she played a prank on her friend.
meanings.sent3: The monkey's roguishness as it stole the banana from the vendor was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The roguishness of the magician as he performed his tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The roguishness of the cat as it knocked over the vase was both mischievous and cute.
